overview: Someone’s in the kitchen with Andrea and they’re cooking up something hot! It’s not surprising because Andrea practices tantric sex – that exotic yoga of sexuality. Sharon Kane gets a torrid taste of this in an awesome girl-girl session – then with a Kama Sutra stud. Next, Shanna McCullough surprises her boyfriend with some sex tricks she’s learned from this carnal cult.
tagline: The Couples Film of the Year!
title: Our Dinner with Andrea
